Description: Gene that the resource is related to
Canonical (trade or IUPAC) name of molecule
Logarithm of the water/octanol partition coefficient (logP) or hydrophobicity score
Experimental water solubility of the compound in mg per ml or g per l
Molecular weight of one molecule (including addends)
Purity of the compound in percent
ID or catalogue number assigned to the specific supplied sample by the vendor or provider
Vendor or lab that supplied the compound
SMILES representation as provided from the vendor (full structure with all information)
External link to published data relevant for the current Pharos page
External ID (PubChem, CheBI, ZINC, etc.) corresponding to the canonical representation
Repository corresponding to the external ID
Physical repository from which the IDG resource can be purchased
External link to physical repositories containing key metadata and ordering information for the resource
